name: The Backrooms (RM2k3 Edition)
description:
Explore The Backrooms in RPG Maker 2003!

Explore to your heart's content, and discover all the little interactive references scattered around the map.

This game was made over the course of a few days, so it's very small. Still, I hope you have fun, if you do decide to download it.

(Just to clarify, I don't claim ownership of everything shown in this game, a couple of the references are of already existing things. You'll know what I mean when you see them.)
